ygData.subject: Brian: Your help is needed
ygData.msgSnippet: Brian, Why didn t Verant think Trolls or Ogres could be Rogues? Granted amongst the other races that would be obvious, but in their home cities any race is
ygData.messageBody:
Brian,

Why didn't Verant think Trolls or Ogres could be Rogues?
Granted amongst the other races that would be obvious,
but in their home cities any race is capable (and does)
have it's Rogue sect. Heh, I would like to see the
damage on a backstab from a 25th level Troll or Ogre
decked out in strength boosting items and buffs.
And if this is a class over balancing issue, then the
purely racial XP penalties would make up for it.
Especially since most of the Rogue abilities are hosed
anyway and poison didn't actually get implimented til
just recently.
Any word on this from your fellows at Verant?

What happened to the Troll Shaman vendors in the Foriegn
Quarter? This is not a big deal to me, but it is to
several friends of mine.
Also, why can't I train at the Troll SK in Foriegn
Quarter? Are all the Troll SKs walking around just for
looks? Is it because the DE SKs would rather train
there instead of going in another 2 zones to train? But
then again the race thing wouldn't let them anyway... :P

Anyone,
Each city that I have been in has had a secret passage
somewhere. The exception to this seems to be Grobb
(haven't been into Oggok except to be bound just inside)
but I may be wrong. Anyone know of a secret passage in
Grobb?
Also, has anyone been to the "fire pot" in 3rd Gate
near the stone bridge that is on the other side of the
fletcher shop?
When I click on it it says I do not have the key. I
tried the first and second keys from Befallen, but those
didn't work. Ideas? I have yet to see a Rogue in Neriak
to help me. Heh.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
